description: CounterAction is an optional action that can be performed on a Counter at allocation.

action.description: Action must to either "Increment" or "Decrement" the Counter's Count. Must also define the Amount.

amount.description: Amount is the amount to increment or decrement the Count. Must be a positive integer.

capacity.description: Capacity is the amount to update the maximum capacity of the Counter to this number. Min 0, Max int64.
